job.title: Machine Learning Operations Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Health, Wellness and Fitness
job.description:
AI/ML Ops EngineerTeleHealth Start Up aiming to revolutionise healthcare⚡New York (remote US/Europe)$145,000 - $180,000 + Equity + Benefits&nbsp;A New York based&nbsp;HealthTech Analytics Company&nbsp;is looking to hire an AI/ML Ops Engineer.&nbsp;They have recently raised over $20million Series B Funding to assist their rapid growth across the states and potentially Europe as well! The AI/ML Ops Engineer will join a team of ML and NLP&nbsp;(Natural Language Processing)&nbsp;experts, and will work closely with the AI Scientist to leverage healthcare data, and be fundamental in building their automated quality assessment program.The AI/ML Ops Engineer should have prior experience in the Healthtech Space or a keen interest and passion for working on lifechanging and meaningful projects.&nbsp;&nbsp;Responsibilities  - Build and deploy robust, industrial scale Machine Learning Pipelines for NLP (Natural Language Processing)   
  - Collaborate with both Software Engineering teams and Data Science teams   
  - Enhance and maintain pipelines for continuous integration   
  - Contribute to the enhancement and extension of data analytics pipelines   
&nbsp;Requirements  - MS/PhD in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related discipline   
  - MUST have experience deploying Machine Learning Models   
  - Experience within Unix-based Environments&nbsp;   
  - Expert proficiency with Python, AWS and related libraries   
  - Ideally experience with deep learning frameworks such as PyTorch and Tensorflow   
  - Strong communication skills as you will be required to collaborate with teams across data, engineering   
  - Experience or interest in the HealthTech. Experience working in a similar organization would be a big plus but not required   
  - Bonus if you have experience with Kubernetes, Docker, or similar platforms   
&nbsp;Benefits  - Competitive Salary + Equity&nbsp;(negotiable and based on experience)   
  - Robust healthcare plans and matching 401K   
  - Flexible working hours and WFH   
  - Stipend to spruce up your home office!   
  - Great people to work with - an extremely diverse team and a company that cares about Diversity, Equity & Inclusion   
  - Lots of virtual events for you to connect with your team   
   The team has just started it’s search and with the fast growth plans is looking to secure a candidate as soon as possible.&nbsp;🌎 The office is based in New York. Remote may be a possibility.&nbsp;📧 Interested in applying? Please click on the ‘Easy Apply’ button&nbsp;⚡&nbsp;Storm3 is a HealthTech recruitment firm with clients across London, Europe and North America. To discuss open opportunities or career options, please visit our website www.storm3.com and&nbsp;follow the Storm3 Linked In page for the latest jobs and intel
